title: The Love Story of A Passerby - Novel Updates
tags: Average-looking Protagonist   Boss-Subordinate Relationship   Inferiority Complex   Modern Day   Naive Protagonist   Office Romance   Older Love Interests   Protagonist Falls in Love First
author: Mo Xin Shang   莫心伤
description:
My name is Wang Shou Ning and I’m 26 years old this year. Maybe some day in the future you will pass by me on the street, but you have forgotten my name; if that is the case then you can call me a passerby {stranger}.

When you pass by me you might see a handsome man walking right next to me. You will not need to wonder or doubt because yes, he is actually with me; he is my boyfriend.>
